alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 7:47PM CDT until July 04 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Fillmore County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Thayer County in south central Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairfield, or 22 miles southeast of Hastings, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sutton, Harvard, Clay Center, Edgar, Fairfield, Shickley, Davenport, Bruning, Deweese, Ong and Saronville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
